definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: pillar, prefect, also appar. garrison, post (Sir 46:18 [[ויבנע נחיבי חר]] and he subdued garrisons, posts, of the foe);—´[[נ]] abs. 1Ki 4:19; cstr. 1Sa 13:3 + 3 t.; pl. [[נְחִיבִים]] 2Sa 8:6 + 2 t. + 2Ch 8:10 Kt, [[נְחִבִים]] 2Sa 8:14, 2Sa 8:14; cstr. [[נְחִבֵי]] 1Sa 10:5 MT, but rd. [[נְחִיב]] LXX SyrVer Vulgate Th We Dr Klo Kit Bu HPS;—

prefect, deputy 1Ki 4:19 (on text cf. Klo Benz), so perh. also 1Sa 10:5 (HPS; pillar LXX Th Dr klo Kit), and appar. 1Sa 13:3, 1Sa 13:4 (> al. pillar); this mng. serves also for 2Sa 8:6, 2Sa 8:14, 2Sa 8:14 (so Ki; Th HPS garrison) 1Ch 11:16, 1Ch 18:13, 2Ch 8:10 (where rd. Kt), 2Ch 17:2 (Kau garrison in 2Ch 11:16, 2Ch 17:2; Sir 46:18—v. supr.—would favour this meaning in other passages).
